analysis.description:
GeneNuggetsToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/22/0x6c7bbd8b6c32512dd36d8eecdb3ed4429eb8a85d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x6c7bbd8b6c32512dd36d8eecdb3ed4429eb8a85d.sol)

GeneNuggetsToken.exchange (/unique_chucks/22/0x6c7bbd8b6c32512dd36d8eecdb3ed4429eb8a85d.sol#478-493) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((block.timestamp - CustomerService[msg.sender]) > exchangeInterval) (/unique_chucks/22/0x6c7bbd8b6c32512dd36d8eecdb3ed4429eb8a85d.sol#484)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x6c7bbd8b6c32512dd36d8eecdb3ed4429eb8a85d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/22/0x6c7bbd8b6c32512dd36d8eecdb3ed4429eb8a85d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/22/0x6c7bbd8b6c32512dd36d8eecdb3ed4429eb8a85d.sol#204) is not in mixedCase
